answers.answer: It depends on your doctor. I'm high risked and 34w preg. I've had ultrasounds at 19, 25, 28, 32 & one scheduled at 35w because my baby is breeched.

I have only had two and my last one was at 5 months... I don't have any risks but I feel like there is no real connection with my doctor and that my appointments just fly by with no real information being reached. I am ready to see him again !
You may not get another one. My doc said my last one was at 20 weeks . I am getting a complimentary 3d/4d ultrasound when I'm 31 weeks, but that one is just for fun.
Some doctors do a 35 week for your first even if they believe you to have a low risk pregnancy but some do not. Talk with your doctor :-). After your first your last is at 5 months in my experience.

A lot of people only get one and at 20 weeks to check size, sex and for any physical abnormalities. So you may not have another unless there is a medical reason. If you're not feeling connected to your doctor, then tell him/her.

For my first 2 pregnancies I had 2 each ..... 1-determine weeks at beginning and the second was the regular 20week scan + sex ;-)This pregnancy however, I have already had the regular 2 but am having a third at 35 weeks to see her weight because I have gestational diabetes.
Today I am 28 weeks and my 3rd ultrasound is this coming up friday it just depends on who your doctor is
And I have a Normal pregnancy
